Package hu.zza.clim

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.zza.clim.Menu

    Represents the menu that the user can interact with: navigation, function calls, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • listOptions

        public void listOptions()
        Prints the available options from the current position of the Menu.

      • chooseOption

        public void chooseOption​(java.lang.String consoleInput)
        Choose an option from the available ones. If it is a node, Menu navigates itself to this position. If it is a leaf, Menu call its function, and according to the result, it navigates itself toward.

        The desired format of consoleInput depends on the UserInterface of the Menu object:
        UserInterface.NOMINAL requires the exact name of the choosen option.
        UserInterface.ORDINAL and UserInterface.ORDINAL_TRAILING_ZERO require a numeric string which is parsable with Integer.parseInt(String).
        UserInterface.PARAMETRIC is more flexible (depends on the configuration of the ParameterMatcher).

        Parameters:
        consoleInput - the choice of the user, its desired format (single integer, alphanumeric text, etc.) depends on UserInterface

      • printLicense

        public void printLicense()
        Prints the full license information about clim.

      • printShortLicense

        public void printShortLicense()
        Prints short license information about clim.
